title: Bid Rigging and Vendor Collusion Scheme
description: Coordinated bid rigging involving 5 vendors submitting complementary bids to ensure predetermined winner across 8 tenders
indicators: Vendors submitted bids in rotational winning pattern
Non-winning bids consistently 2-5% higher than winner
Common IP addresses used for bid submissions
Winning vendor always lowest by narrow margin
actionsTaken: Asset freeze requested for suspect vendors
recommendedActions: Enhanced due diligence for repeat bidders

title: Ghost Workers Scheme in Health Facilities
description: Systematic creation and maintenance of 43 ghost workers across 6 rural health facilities resulting in fraudulent salary payments
indicators: Multiple employees sharing same bank accounts
recommendedActions: Mandatory biometric verification for all payments
Automated cross-matching of HR and payment systems

title: Municipal Revenue Diversion Scheme
description: Systematic diversion of municipal revenue through fake receipt books and unbanked collections totaling ZMW 12.4M
indicators: Missing serial numbers in official receipts
Revenue collections below market activity levels
Business permits issued without revenue records

title: Medical Equipment Theft and Sale
description: Theft and resale of government medical equipment through fake disposal and transfer documentation
indicators: 27 high-value equipment items missing from register
Equipment found in private health facilities
actionsTaken: Perpetrator arrested and convicted (3 years imprisonment)

title: Inflated Invoice and Kickback Scheme
description: Systematic price inflation in supply contracts with kickback payments to procurement officials, estimated ZMW 18.5M overcharge
detectionMethod: Price Benchmarking AI & Financial Flow Analysis
indicators: Luxury purchases by procurement official beyond means
Offshore payments from supplier to official's relatives
actionsTaken: Official suspended and bank accounts frozen
New procurement for affected items initiated
recommendedActions: Third-party price verification for high-value items

title: Fictitious Beneficiary Scheme in Social Program
description: Creation of 380 fictitious beneficiaries in social cash transfer program to divert ZMW 6.8M in grant funds
entityName: Social Cash Transfer Program - Southern Province
indicators: Payments to beneficiaries without valid IDs
Clustering of new registrations in single month
Payment collection patterns indicate single collector
recommendedActions: Mandatory biometric enrollment for all beneficiaries

title: Government Vehicle Fuel Diversion
description: Systematic fuel siphoning and sale from government vehicles through collusion between drivers and fuel station attendants
indicators: GPS shows minimal mileage vs fuel claimed
Evening fuel purchases without corresponding trips
recommendedActions: Random fuel quality and quantity checks
